TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SessionStateSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class SessionStateSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Web 应用程序的会话状态。

span.span: Configures the session state for a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引用 Machine.config 或由标记标识的 Web.config 配置文件中的元素 `sessionState` 。The class refers to the element in the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file identified by the `sessionState` tag. 当新客户端开始与 Web 应用程序交互时，将在会话有效期间发出会话 ID 并将其与来自同一客户端的所有后续请求关联。When a new client begins interacting with a Web application, a session ID is issued and associated with all the subsequent requests from the same client during the time that the session is valid. 此 ID 用于维护每个请求之间与客户端会话关联的服务器端状态。This ID is used to maintain server-side state associated with the client session across requests. 控制 ASP.NET 应用程序代表每个客户端建立和维护此关联的方式。The controls how the ASP.NET application establishes and maintains this association on behalf of each client. 此机制非常灵活，并使你能够在进程外托管会话状态信息，并在不使用 cookie 的情况下跟踪状态。This mechanism is very flexible and gives you the ability to host session-state information out of process and to track state without using cookies, among other things. ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式为部分的多个属性指定值 `sessionState` ，该部分也可以作为类的成员进行访问 。The first demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `sessionState` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 第二个示例演示如何使用 类。The second demonstrates how to use the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为节指定值 `sessionState` 。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `sessionState` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET State Management Overview
ASP.NET Session State Overview
Controlling Session State

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 值设置为 `true` ，则 ASP.NET 将使用 类来压缩和扩展会话状态数据。When the value is set to `true`, ASP.NET uses the class to compress and expand session-state data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::HttpCookieMode Cookieless { System::Web::HttpCookieMode get(); void set(System::Web::HttpCookieMode value); };
member this.Cookieless : System.Web.HttpCookieMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用 Cookie 标识客户端会话。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cookies are used to identify client sessions.

value.span: 如果所有请求都被视为无 Cookie，则为 ；如果没有任何请求被视为无 Cookie，则为 ；或者为 值之一。

span.span: if all requests are treated as cookieless, or if no requests are treated as cookieless, or one of the values.

value.span: 在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，默认值为 。

span.span: The default value in ASP.NET version 2.0 is .

value.span: 在早期版本中，默认值为 。

span.span: In earlier versions, the default value was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态可以通过两种方式来存储将客户端与服务器会话关联的唯一 ID：在客户端上存储 HTTP cookie，或对 URL 中的会话 ID 进行编码。There are two ways that session state can store the unique ID that associates the client with a server session: by storing an HTTP cookie on the client or by encoding the session ID in the URL. 将会话 ID 存储在 cookie 中会更安全，但要求客户端浏览器支持 cookie。Storing the session ID in the cookie is more secure but requires the client browser to support cookies. 对于允许不支持 cookie 的客户端的应用程序（如多种移动设备），可以将会话 ID 存储在 URL 中。For applications that allow clients that do not support cookies, such as a variety of mobile devices, the session ID may be stored in the URL. URL 选项具有几个缺点。The URL option has several drawbacks. 它要求站点上的链接是相对的，并且在会话开始时将使用新的查询字符串值重定向页面，并且它会在查询字符串中公开会话 ID，可以在该字符串中选取该会话 ID 以在安全攻击中使用。It requires that the links on the site be relative and that the page be redirected at the beginning of the session with new query-string values, and it exposes the session ID right in the query string, where it can be picked up for use in a security attack. 如果你需要支持缺少 cookie 支持的客户端，则建议你仅使用无 cookie 模式。You are encouraged to use the cookieless mode only if you need to support clients that lack cookie support. 会话状态还支持另外两个选项： 和 。Session state also supports two additional options: and . 前者启用会话状态模块，以根据浏览器功能确定基于每个客户端使用哪种模式 (cookie 或无 cookie) 。The former enables the session-state module to determine what mode (cookie or cookieless) is used on a per-client basis based on the browser capabilities. 选项使用浏览器执行握手，以验证是否可以存储 cookie，并因此需要额外的请求来做出决定。The option performs a handshake with the browser to verify whether a cookie may be stored, and therefore requires an additional request to make the determination. 如果需要支持无 cookie 的客户端，则强烈考虑使用 只为需要它们的客户端生成无 Cookie url。If you need to support cookieless clients, strongly consider using to generate cookieless URLs only for clients that require them. > [!NOTE] > UP。Browser 4.1 或更高。浏览器3.2 的 行为方式始终与对象的属性的值相同 `false` ，除非 Web.config 的部分中的属性 显式设置为 `true` 。With UP.Browser 4.1 or UP.Browser 3.2, always behaves as if the value of the property of the object is `false`, unless the property in the section of Web.config has been explicitly set to `true`. > > 在 ASP.NET 版本1.1 中，此设置的选项为 `true` 或 `false` ，但对于 ASP.NET 2.0，将展开选项，并且 现在为默认设置。In ASP.NET version 1.1, the options for this setting were `true` or `false`, but with ASP.NET 2.0, the choices are expanded, and is now the default setting. 如果你的 Web 应用程序 将属性设置为布尔值，则 应对这些浏览器按预期方式工作。If your Web application has the property set to a Boolean value, then should work as expected for these browsers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是必需的属性，并且可以从配置层次结构中的更高级别或从默认值继承。The is not a required attribute and can be inherited from a higher level in the configuration hierarchy or from the default value. 但是，此部分的配置处理程序将始终在写入此部分时根据当前继承的值写出模式。However, the configuration handler for this section will always write out the mode based on the current inherited value when writing this section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. span.span: A value specifying where to store the session state, or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 指定了属性，则 忽略属性和 属性。If the property is specified, the property and property are ignored. 可以通过 属性（如 sessionState 元素中的其他属性）锁定， [ (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100))元素。The can be locked via the property like other properties within the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) element. 返回的连接字符串 将用于每个请求，以连接到请求的其余部分的适当服务器位置。The connection string returned by the will be used on every request to connect to the appropriate server location for the remainder of the request. 如果连接字符串无效，则 ASP.NET 将引发与服务器的配置连接字符串无效时引发的相同异常。If the connection string is invalid, ASP.NET will throw the same exception that is thrown when the configured connection string to the server is invalid. 在 SQL 或状态服务器模式下，此属性用于对多个后端节点上的会话状态数据进行分区。This property is used to partition session-state data across multiple backend nodes when in SQL or state-server mode.

summary.span: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 重新连接到数据库之前应经过的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval that should elapse before ASP.NET reconnects to the database.

value.span: ASP.NET 重新连接到数据库之前应经过的时间间隔。

span.span: The time interval that should elapse before ASP.NET reconnects to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定发生连接错误时重新连接到数据库之前的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。The specifies the time interval in seconds before reconnecting to the database when a connection error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SqlConnectionString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL connection string.

value.span: SQL 连接字符串。

span.span: The SQL connection string.

value.span: 其默认值为泛型字符串："data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

span.span: Its default value is the generic string: "data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sqlConnectionString`当设置为时，此属性是必需的 。This `sqlConnectionString` attribute is required when is set to . > [!NOTE] > 若要使用 会话状态模式，你必须在*drive* \\ 运行将存储会话状态的 SQL Server 的计算机上，运行安装在 [drive：] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework) .NET Framework*VersionNumber*中的 InstallSqlState sql 脚本 (。To use the session state mode, you must run the InstallSqlState.sql SQL script (which is installed in [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber* as part of the default .NET Framework installation) on the computer running SQL Server that will store the session state. 这将创建一个名为 ASPState 的数据库，其中包含新的存储过程，并在 TempDB 数据库中创建新的 ASPStateTempApplications 和 ASPStateTempSessions 表。This creates a database called ASPState with new stored procedures and creates new ASPStateTempApplications and ASPStateTempSessions tables in the TempDB database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#8)]

value.span: 状态服务器连接字符串。

span.span: The state server connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当远程存储会话状态时，此属性指定服务器名称和端口。This property specifies the server name and the port when the session state is stored remotely. `stateConnectionString`当设置为时，属性是必需的 。The `stateConnectionString` attribute is required when the is set to . > [!NOTE] > 请确保 ASP.NET 状态服务正在存储会话状态信息的远程服务器上运行。Make sure the ASP.NET state service is running on the remote server that stores the session-state information. 此服务随 ASP.NET 一起安装，默认情况下位于 [*drive*：] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework \\ *VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe。This service is installed with ASP.NET and is located by default at [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan StateNetworkTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.StateNetworkTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器和状态服务器间的网络连接可保持空闲的时间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle.

value.span: 放弃会话前 Web 服务器和状态服务器间的网络连接可保持空闲的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time, in seconds, that the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle before the session is abandoned.

value.span: 默认值为 10 秒。

span.span: The default value is 10 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sessionStateSection`当 属性设置为时，此属性是必需的 。This `sessionStateSection` attribute is required when the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. summary.span: 获取或设置会话超时。

span.span: Gets or sets the session time-out.

value.span: 会话超时（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The session time-out, in minutes.

value.span: 默认值为 20 分钟。

span.span: The default value is 20 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性的值不能设置为大于525601分钟 (1 年) 。The property cannot be set to a value greater than 525,601 minutes (1 year). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 有关如何访问对象的详细说明，请参阅类主题中的代码示例 。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object.
